issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Wahram V on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown with two mural element, in the middle a crescent on a pearl; to the left of crescent two ribbons pointing to the upper left; covered korymbos; pearl diadem, diadem ribbons commencing below ball of hair, pointing upwards; earing consisting of two elements; neck-line of tunica edged with row of pearls; double row of pearls running from the shoulders to the breast ornament (only upper part visible); floral elements below bust; dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 5 h l. o. wlhl'n MRKAn MRKA ZY klpkl| Wāhram šāhān šāh ī kirbakkar|"Wahram, King of Kings, the Beneficent"
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; round altar shaft; to the left and right of the shaft ribbons pointing downwards, three altar slabs; in front of them bust with stylized crown of Wahram V to the right; alter flames depicted with vertical strokes; to the left and right of altar attendant with stylized crown of Wahram V, holding a barsom with both hands, dotted border
issue_reverse_legend_s: 9 h l. o. wlhl'n| Wāhram| “ Wahram”
